short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is my first ever extension! You can enter numebrs in the boxes, then press enter to get a random number between those

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hello. This is my first extension. I hope U find this useful. How it works is that you enter two numbers in the two boxes in the popup. Then press enter to get a random number between those two numbers.

This can be a useful extension to Install as, for example, u might need a random number to select how many XYZ u need in a game.

And why should you use this extension for generating random numbers instead of others. The answer is because it has some extra features which most don't have.

If you have a complaint, suggestion or have spotted a glitch, then contact via the google form on the support tab.

Secret: Press F2 to cycle between two themes.

What's new in the 1.1 update:
- Added support for decimal numbers. The extension will generate random numbers with the amount of decimal places the same as the first number you entered.
